statements: UPDATE biodegradable_inventory SET quantity = 50, price = 25.99 WHERE id = '4efed65c-00bc-493a-b160-45fcbb4d1bd9';

UPDATE biodegradable_inventory SET price = price * 1.1, item_name = 'Eco-Friendly Water Bottles' WHERE item_type = 'bottle';
